text: Class 80 http://www.therailwaycentre.com/Resource_data/All%20Time%20class%20Loco.pdf was the TOPS classification allocated by British Rail to the prototype 25 kV AC electric locomotive. This locomotive was built by Metropolitan-Vickers, initially as a prototype Gas turbine-electric locomotive, numbered 18100. British Rail allocated the number E1000 (and later E2001) to the locomotive following its conversion from gas turbine propulsion. == References == 80 Category:A1A-A1A locomotives
title: British Rail Class 80
